languages.text: "Она в тебе есть. И скоро ты умрешь. Я соврал лишь в том, что могу тебя спасти. Все остальное — правда".

traits.locale_text: "Она в тебе есть. И скоро ты умрешь. Я соврал лишь в том, что могу тебя спасти. Все остальное — правда".
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."
languages.original_text: "Она в тебе есть. И скоро ты умрешь. Я соврал лишь в том, что могу тебя спасти. Все остальное — правда".

traits.locale_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."

languages.text: “它就在你身上，而且你很快就要没命了。我谎称我能救你一命，但别的事情都是真的。”
languages.original_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."

traits.locale_text: “它就在你身上，而且你很快就要没命了。我谎称我能救你一命，但别的事情都是真的。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Está en tu interior y morirás pronto. Solo he mentido al decir que podía salvarte. Lo demás es cierto».
languages.original_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."

traits.locale_text: «Está en tu interior y morirás pronto. Solo he mentido al decir que podía salvarte. Lo demás es cierto».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「寄生虫はいる。そして貴様はやがて死ぬ。貴様を救えるという嘘はついたが、後はすべて真実だ」
languages.original_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."

traits.locale_text: 「寄生虫はいる。そして貴様はやがて死ぬ。貴様を救えるという嘘はついたが、後はすべて真実だ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Sie ist in Euch. Und Ihr werdet bald sterben. Gelogen habe ich nur in einem Punkt, nämlich darin, dass ich Euch retten könnte. Alles andere ist wahr."
languages.original_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."

traits.locale_text: "Sie ist in Euch. Und Ihr werdet bald sterben. Gelogen habe ich nur in einem Punkt, nämlich darin, dass ich Euch retten könnte. Alles andere ist wahr."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Oh non, il est bien en vous et vous n'allez pas tarder à en mourir. J'ai seulement quand j'ai dit que je pouvais vous sauver. Tout le reste est vrai. »
languages.original_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."

traits.locale_text: « Oh non, il est bien en vous et vous n'allez pas tarder à en mourir. J'ai seulement quand j'ai dit que je pouvais vous sauver. Tout le reste est vrai. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "İçinde, evet. Pek yakında öleceksin. Yalnızca seni kurtarabileceğimi belirttiğim kısım yalandı. Gerisi doğru."
languages.original_text: "It's in you. And you'll die soon. The only thing I lied about was being able to save you. The rest of it is true."
